items.title: What the charts are showing for gold and this mining stock heading into 2026

items.title: Robinhood has already outperformed the S&P 500 this year. Truist thinks it can still go further

items.title: Airbnb’s shares are in a 5-year slump. One analyst believes 2026 will be their year
